values:
are you aware that my family is less than normal? that my dad is fucking retarded? not that anything is wrong with him, he just...says and does things that are just plain weird.
and my mom just plain gets mad at whenever I do anything. right or wrong.
and its not like a yelling-right-away angry she just sighs and walks off and you feel like you've hurt her intentionally. because..you try to apologize and its like "why did i come out here in the first place?" kinda feeling...
ugh. I hate life. ><

or atleast life in this house

nothing interesting, so this'll be what I did today:

I got up when I was supposed to today [for once :)] its mostly because I heard my mom caughing terribly. =/ so of course I made a smart-ass comment and got a dirty look. like you know, always. ><

school.

1st pd- worked on a dumb essay w/ the sub about job applications.
2nd pd- watched a Brad Pitt movie [it was coolies]
3rd pd- study hall. Sara was done w/ com. service in the library so she'll be there for the rest of the year =]
4th pd- went over packet and looked at Octopai [octopusses]
lunch. Misty wasn't there ='(. TACOS =]
5th pd- did a worksheet. watched Mr. Phillips count
6th pd- study hall. Emily sitting with us again
7th pd- tv tech. zoned out while Steve & Ian worked on Silent film.
8th pd- German, made fun of Lamer freshmen while listening to FF tell us a story about the Pied Piper. also:: battle of the languages tomorrow. 

Battle of the languages:: kids from all language classes [german, french, spanish, latin] competing in random tasks/games to determine what the best language is. [-cough cough- german -cough cough-]


um...so then I went home and mom was on the phone w/ nextel so I shut up and then we figured out how my backwards headphones fit into my phone. It goes through the bluetooth. weird, right?

then mom left for work and my dad comes in and hands me a $20 bill and I'm like "...thanks?"
dad: thats for being a good girl and driving so well all the time"
so I kinda accepted it. =] gonna buy much needed clothes.

lolz- Denise and I are talkin bad about Molly [my sis in law]
...its kinda funn

OH! by the way.
my parents are kinda...GOING TO FLORIDA tomorrow.
...without me.
they're making me stay with MOLLY.
I.HATE.HER SO BAD

also:: I have the hiccups. not fun.



peace.out

<3 MK

so, as I've probably already told you...

I gots a new celly phone! whoot. Sprint Fusic.
best.thing.ever.

ALSO WATCHING HAPPY FEET
yay
<3 mumble.


so anyways...0o idk what to sayyyy
=p

alright, so  this WHOLE week they've been making this announcement that said 'MANDATORY DRAMA MEETING ON WED.!!'
so....7 of us show up. there are about 20 of us normally.
IM SO PISSED

people are always slacking when it comes to drama. isn't anyone else passionate about this? I know they are, but they can't all come because....?

UGHHHH

WTF?!

so, OK. We're on the bus. and my mom is actually in the truck in front of us. we're turning to go onto my street and this girl who I really LOATHE COMPLETLEY(Emily M.) says this because I guess my mom was taking a while "Just hit 'em"

....

THATS MY MOM BITCH
if that was your mom, you wouldn't want me to say something like that. I KNOW YOU WOULDN'T.

thats my fucking mom, whore.

thats all. just angry

okay, so I know I just posted last night, but thats what these things are for, yes?
um, OK so I've kinda had a lot of things to think about latley because my dad's "ex" girlfriend has been hanging out with me and my mom latley. AND SHES SO AWESOME.
 her name is Kristen.
and one time I told my mom that I think she would be such a cool step-mom and mom ruined it by saying this "too bad, 'cause your stuck with me, honey"
...thanks ma...

so anyway she keeps coming over and thats cool.
my dad is an asshole, though.
he went to my cousin's "lacrosse" game at 6 and I went to bed at 12 and didn't see him.
><

still totally pissed at the Shakespeare thing, but I think we might just put it on as a school production.
ummm....yeah so you have to come see meeeee

One time my friend Sara told me that I could "probably write a book from all my journal enteries."
I think I might do that.
not immediatley
but one day.

okay, so yesterday at school, Mr. O'clock (the sub) let us on the computer in TV tech and I was looking up acting internships in philly and I find this website FOR THE SHAKESPEARE FEST! ugh

also, I was watching Queer as Folk for like 3 hours last night (<3) and Melanie and Lindsay ( the 2 lesbians) wanted to admit their kid into this special school and he couldn't get in b/c he had same sex parents!!
='(

OH! OH! and there was this commercial for philly and theres this 17th century guy and hes writing a letter to his lover and is all like "I love you and miss you" and all that junk so he says he'll meet his lover somewhere and hes standing there and here comes some lady walking by, but the way your viewing it, it makes it look like shes the lover. so she walks by. and here comes this dude and he meets our guy and they TOTALLY START MACKING
it was funny.
good commercial.

so OK, I've got somethings to talk abouttt...
okay so I'm totally having an orgasm watching QUEER AS FOLK. boys sexxing ;p

and theres this "rap" song thats called 'I'm a flirt'
...REALLY?! so is everyone else IN THE WORLD. like...you HAVE to flirt to get...well, sex.....

thats all I really have to say, except that I really hate these people who CANCELLED THE SHAKESPEARE FESTIVEL!!!!!!
ahhhhhhhh!!!!

Story time::
  So, its no secret that I really really really have a passion for drama club. and acting. and ok so we were going to preform a play 'Much Ado about Nothing' (<3) and I was cast as "Margerate" whose a maid. I only had four lines, BUT STILL!! so, I had them all down and memorized and it was great but then on Wednesday I walk into drama, and I was the first person there. no biggie. so Ms. Meredith tells me (and Katherine) that Unionville cancelled the festivel.
....fuckkkkk.....

0o sorry I was away for...EVER! I didn't go anywhere, I just...didn't.update. sorriez. so anyways...trying to uplpoad this stupid camera soft ware into my comp for the concert on tues. yess Taste of Chaos. =D

so...I went home during Study Hall yesterday. Bad fucking headache. and then I came home and my parents took me to the drs. and then...and I barfed like...100 times (more like twice) and then I crashed for like...all day.
I woke up this morning at like 10, and thats about itt..

mom asked if I wanted to go to the hospital and I said yes but we didn't go. =(

she said she might take me tomorrow =/

my dad is an asshole

so like...last week my mom was all like  "we're gonna go peirce your nose next Saturday at noon" and I was like: ngmsldgsk YESSSSSSSSSSS

so like...its Saturday. at noon. and I was freakin out b/c my mom was all like "LETS GO!"
and we did, but at about 2. so...then we had some trouble getting there b/c my dad is...my dad. lol j/k i love him though

so then we get there and have a FUN TIME running across the highway to get the paper notorized and then...we ran back and its like NEGATIVE 3 DEGREES OUTSIDE and we go back and wait for about a half hour, we passed the time looking @ tattoes. lol. there was this one of THE LION KING!!! yess...I <3 Simba...

SO WE GET BACK THERE...and umm...well I almost whimped out! lol
and then she stuck me with the needle and I screamed. alot. and then I cried. alot. and then it was over, and I go out with this tear streaked face and everyone was like..."aww"

and then on the way back home, I was admirering myself in the mirror. Even though it was bleeding like 300%. I almost passed out. eep.

so, yeah. its blue. its hXc

and then...we went to my nephew's house for a couple hours.

..I could really use a soda 0o ...weird?

so...all the chicas in my little group all have boy toys and I'm all like:
 "=3 whores. Just wait for the next school...thing that is important! YESH! then I will show youuu. haha I <3 Gini"

SO ANYWAY
I tried to get an uber cool layout for this thing and it was all like YOU CANNOT VIEW THISSSS
and I was like "fuckkk"
and then that was it. 0o

so...like...I deff love Lindsi for resizing pics of me for myspace.
yay!!

no.internet

Merry christmas 3 days ago.

Peace outttt

I like that last title by the way
So like...I must have this talent for writing alot on LJ AND THEN DELETEING IT ALL!!! ><grrrr

so anyway. The other day:

retard Gangsta kid yesterday: Yo! I want all rights for Mexicans,yo. (pause) EXCEPT GAY RIGHTS, I DON'T WANT ANY OF THAT SHIT.

...JESUS CHRIST!
grrr x 10000
Why the fuck do you have to be "hating" on...ME!??
why why why why?!?!?!?


what is so DREADFULLY WRONG with being gay?! Its almost looked down upon.

Ex. 1::
        Girl: like...ohh mmyyy gaaawwwddd...do you wanna like...-pause- go out with meeeeee?
        Boy: ...I KISS BOYS, dammit! ><
        Girl: -shreik- OMG, I'M GONNA BARF!

what the fuck?
last year, people wanted to be gay!
now its almost like a sin.
well, it is a sin.
but its almost like I just told you that I picked my nose and wiped it on your face.

And why does the word "gay" seem to mean 'stupid'?

Ex. 2::
     Boy: omfg, that math test was so gay!
     Boy 2: I know, Mr. Smith is such a fag!
     Boy 1: I know, jeeze.

so anyway.

...why is everyone in my 5th period ( with the exception of 4 people) really retarded?
...and by retarded, I don't mean stupid or mentally.
I mean GANGSTA.
gangsta freshmen = ...dumbasses who think they're funny, but they aren't.
damn.

omfg...I had a whole 2 paragraphs on here and then my computer was like "GRR!!! no livejournal for yoouuu" ..So I'll try again?
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

annnddddd....
GUESS WHO IS GOING TO TASTE OF CHAOS WITH...DENISE?!?!?!
meeeeee =3

omfg about that winter dance thing (Mistletoe magic) I didn't even see it coming! They called my name on the announcements in the afternoon and I was like "wtf?!" and this lady was all like..."uhh...you've been nominated.." and then me= =33333

uhh...OH yes! I did Christmas Cards last night and I did them forr...all my school friends and...
someone special....AKA GINI MOOS

=D

thats the whole thing, really. summed up

So like...I didn't wanna go to school todayyyy....
school is like x.x

First period I totally lost me effing Agenda Book and I needed it and things.
grrrrrrrrr.....
Second period is a whole bunch of funniness. Because...Mr. Falcone is all like "GRRRR!!! Unionville is like the dirt-shit of everything.
(Hes telling the truth btw)

Wednesday= 3rd pd. study hall.
Fourth period is a damn shame of a subject. I'm gonna be an actress, I don't need BIOLOGY...
....fukc biology....

then lunch is crap because Misty wasn't there and I don't think she'll ever be there again. T_T
And then I totally helped with the breakup of Chris and Michele.
I think.

Chris LaFrance= HAAATTTEEEEEx 1 billion. because he's so damn juvinille. MORE SO THAN A FUCKING 3 YEAR OLD.
BUT WORSE.
hes an UGLY 3 year old whose on drugs. seriously.

...fifth period is basically...a bunch of fucktard freshmen being Gangsta.
well, don't I just fit in quite nicley? ><?

its like...special ed for smart kids.
eight period we did this German National Exam crap.
WHICH I GOT AN A ONNN!!
pluss....

I HAVE AN A- IN BIOLOGY!

Umm...3 more days until I go on a dattee with Giniiii....!!!
